core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix corporate reliability with high-tech precision.
Content is King: Products are the heroes. White space is the stage.
Contrast: Deep Royal Blue vs. Stark White. No muddy grays.
Asymmetry: Use grid offsets to create visual tension in the hero section.

rules: Use 'Outfit' with weight 700 or 900 for main headers to convey 'Tech Authority'.
Headings must be Dark Navy (#0F172A) or White (on blue backgrounds).

primary.description: Deep Royal Blue - The anchor of trust. Used for Header, Footer, and Primary Actions.

secondary.description: Cool Slate Grey - Used for backgrounds to break up the white.

accent.description: Electric Blue - Used for 'Buy Now' buttons and active states to pop against the deep blue.

rules: Use solid blocks of Deep Blue for structural elements.
Text on Blue must be Pure White (#FFFFFF).
Text on White must be Slate 900 (#0F172A), never pure black.

grid_system.marketing: Grid Mode A (Tetris): 12-column grid with asymmetric spans for the Hero section.
grid_system.product_list: Grid Mode B (Density): grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6.

sidebar.behavior: hidden lg:block sticky top-24 h-[calc(100vh-6rem)] overflow-y-auto border-r border-slate-100 pr-6

buttons.primary: bg-[#1a1a6c] hover:bg-[#2a2a8c] text-white rounded-md px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-[#1a1a6c] hover:bg-blue-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.product: group relative bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 overflow-hidden hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-blue-900/10 transition-all duration-300
cards.feature: bg-slate-50 rounded-lg p-8 border border-transparent hover:border-blue-100 transition-colors

navigation.header: bg-[#1a1a6c] text-white sticky top-0 z-50 shadow-md

micro_interactions: Hovering a product card should slightly lift it (-translate-y-1).
Buttons should have a subtle scale effect on click (active:scale-95).
Images should have a subtle zoom on hover (group-hover:scale-105).

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons (Search, ShoppingCart, Menu, ChevronDown, etc.).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. THEME: Update 'index.css' to override the CSS variables with the colors defined above. Set the font family globally.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Header (with Logo, Search, Cart) and Footer.
4. HOME: Build the Homepage with a Hero section (Grid Mode A), a Sidebar for categories, and a Product Grid (Grid Mode B).
5. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components (Card, Button, Input, Sheet) but customize their classes to match the 'zenXteknoloji' style defined here.
6. DATA: Since there is no backend data yet, create a 'mockData.js' file with an array of 8-12 products using the placeholder images provided.
7. RESPONSIVE: Ensure the Sidebar is hidden on mobile and accessible via a Sheet/Drawer menu.
8. LANGUAGE: All visible text must be in Turkish.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
